text:
@NikkiHaley @standamericanow Tell you what. When you stand up to the impeached president whose unfitness as @POTUS caused more than 100K unecessary #Covid19 deaths, instead of kissing up to him even when you KNOW he costs not only lives, but our leadership role on the world stage & then we'll talk.
#VoteBlue
